ideaBody: Users can't log in. Getting errors. Please fix ASAP.
projectContext: React app with Node.js backend, JWT auth, PostgreSQL

ideaBody: The numbers on the dashboard don't match what's in the database. Something is off.
The app keeps crashing on my phone. I think its an iphone 13. Happens when I try to upload a photo.
projectContext: React Native app with image upload feature

ideaBody: Some users say they never received the verification email. Not sure how many are affected.
projectContext: Node.js app using SendGrid for transactional emails

ideaBody: Users fill out the long form and when they submit it everything is lost. They have to start over. Super frustrating.
projectContext: Multi-step React form with no auto-save

ideaBody: When I search for 'annual report 2024' I get results from 2019. The search is definitely broken.

ideaTitle: Regular users can access admin pages
ideaBody: Found out that regular users can access /admin/settings if they type the URL directly. This is a security issue.
About 5% of payments are failing with a generic error. Stripe dashboard shows they should go through. Been happening since last deploy.
projectContext: E-commerce site with Stripe integration, Node.js backend

ideaTitle: Times are wrong for some users
ideaBody: Users in Europe see wrong times for events. I think it's a timezone thing. Everything shows in UTC.
projectContext: Event scheduling app with global users

ideaBody: When someone tries to upload a file bigger than ~10MB, nothing happens. No error, no progress bar, it just sits there.
projectContext: Express.js with multer, nginx reverse proxy

ideaBody: Users get logged out while typing a long post and lose everything. No warning that the session is about to expire.
Some images show as broken on the product pages. Maybe its a CDN issue? Started happening this week.
projectContext: E-commerce site with CloudFront CDN for images

ideaBody: Monthly revenue total on the summary page doesn't match the sum of daily revenues. Off by a few hundred dollars. Might be a rounding issue.
Users report receiving the same notification 3-4 times. Especially the daily digest email. Very annoying.
projectContext: Node.js notification service with Bull queue

ideaBody: The drag and drop feature doesn't work in Safari. Works fine in Chrome and Firefox. Users on Macs are complaining.
projectContext: React app using HTML5 drag and drop API
